stories.name: Isaiah
stories.quote: Working at the U-SU is a great learning experience!

cards.title: Culture Fit
cards.children: Those who enjoy what they do and share their passion

cards.title: Innovators
cards.children: Students who see opportunities for improvement

cards.title: Responsible
cards.children: Team members who take ownership of their work

cards.title: Supporters
cards.children: Uplifting self and others in the community, creating a sense of belonging

cards.title: Team Players
cards.children: Being a catalyst and amplifying team impact

cards.title: Upstanding
cards.children: Operating with honesty and communicating openly

positions.description: Responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and functionality of the U-SU facility, including cleaning, setting up equipment, and performing non-technical repairs.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Able to lift 70 pounds and perform regular physical tasks. Experience with maintenance tools and customer service is preferred.

positions.description: Responsible for setting up and breaking down event equipment, supporting programs and activities, and maintaining facility readiness for events.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Able to lift 70 pounds, adapt to changing operational needs, and work effectively with a diverse campus community. Customer service experience preferred.
positions.alt: Student setting up for an event

positions.description: Responsible for supporting the planning, execution, and evaluation of student engagement programs, leadership development, and student organization support within the Center for Student Involvement.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Demonstrates strong communication, organization, and customer service skills. Familiarity with social media and willingness to work with student organizations, including fraternities and sororities, required. Previous customer service experience preferred.

positions.description: Responsible for providing clerical support, greeting guests, managing event reservations, and offering quality customer service at the U-SU front desk.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Demonstrates strong communication, organizational, and customer service skills. Familiarity with office software and equipment preferred. Previous customer service experience preferred.

positions.description: Responsible for supporting the Graphics team with design tasks, creating digital assets, assisting with print production, and contributing to marketing projects and events.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, and Mac applications. Strong organizational, communication, and customer service skills required. Experience with social media platforms and printing preferred.
positions.alt: Graphics team working on design projects

positions.description: Responsible for providing technical support for events and performances, operating audio-visual equipment, and assisting with event setup and facility maintenance at the U-SU.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Able to lift 70 pounds and operate audio-visual equipment. Demonstrates strong communication, organizational, and customer service skills. Experience with technical equipment and event support preferred.

positions.description: Responsible for supporting the Graphics team by distributing promotional materials, organizing supplies, archiving artwork, and assisting with print production and signage installation.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Demonstrates strong organizational, communication, and customer service skills. Willing to learn hands-on production techniques and use distribution tools. Experience with Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, and basic printing preferred.

positions.description: Responsible for supporting financial and administrative operations by maintaining records, assisting with payroll, reconciling transactions, preparing reports, and organizing office documentation.
positions.requirements: Must be a currently enrolled Cal State LA student with a minimum of 6 undergraduate units and a 2.0 GPA, or 4 graduate units and a 3.0 GPA. Demonstrates strong organizational, communication, and clerical skills. Familiarity with financial systems, cash handling, and Microsoft Office preferred.
positions.alt: Student working on financial reports and administrative paperwork at a desk
